resources.string: Here you\'ll find questions related to the extincted animals. Hope you\'ll learn something new. \nThese species presented below are lost to the world, but remember, that we can still save other endangered animals! \nAre you ready to help the world? Visit:
What is the main reason for the extinction of the western black rhinoceros?
Tarpan (Equus ferus ferus), was also known as:
Which of the following information about the quagga is correct?
The last captive specimen died in Amsterdam on 12 August 1883
In the Quagga Project scientists recreated quagga\'s population by cloning
What is(are) the reason(s) for the extinction of the Javan tiger?
Poisoning of tigers and their prey
Lack of the most important prey species, rusa deer
The picture shows the last known individual of the Pinta giant tortoise, what was its name?
The last confirmed sighting of the Caribbean Monk Seal was at Serranilla Bank, between Jamaica and Nicaragua. Which year was it?
Nice! \nReview the quiz to see correct answers
Half way ;) \nReview the quiz to see correct answers
Not that bad - it could have been 0 ;) \nReview the quiz to see correct answers
It couldn\'t be worse, but it\'s just a game ;) \nReview the quiz to see correct answers
